articles.title: An emotional Alex Cora explains why Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl performance meant so much to him

articles.title: Watch: Providence releases body cam footage of Brown University shooting response

Local residents are urged to engage in discussions about campus safety following the incident.

articles.title: Hikers rescued in Vermont amid sub-zero temperatures
articles.description:
Search and rescue teams rescued two Canadian hikers, a 21-year-old man and 19-year-old woman, Vermont State Police say.

summary: Two Canadian hikers were rescued in Vermont amid sub-zero temperatures.

Boston residents should be cautious when hiking in extreme weather conditions.
